name: MARVEL graphs
description: Visualization of network maps of Marvel characters and creators featured together within same comics stories as registered within Marvel's API

scripts.build: npm run importpako && kotatsu build client --config ./webpack.config.js --typescript index.ts --production -o build/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run importpako && kotatsu serve --config ./webpack.config.js --typescript index.ts --public / ./
scripts.rebuildgraphs: npm run savepositions && npm run preparegraphs && npm run aligngraphs
scripts.savepositions: for entity in characters creators; do cp data/Marvel_${entity}_by_stories.json.gz data/Marvel_${entity}_by_stories.json.gz.positions; done
scripts.preparegraphs: ls data/*stories*.gexf | while read f; do node spatialize-network.js $f; echo; done
scripts.preparetestgraphs: ls data/*stories*.gexf | while read f; do node spatialize-network.js $f 100 100; echo; done
scripts.aligngraphs: for entity in characters creators; do for siz in '.' '_full.'; do node align-networks.js data/Marvel_${entity}_by_stories${siz}json.gz data/Marvel_${entity}_by_stories.json.gz.positions; done; done
